Author: Panic-atthepanic
Text: I'm sorry you're in a lot of pain.  I don't know what happened exactly but I'm here if you need reassurance.  Because you aren't a fat failure.  Not at all.  That's your ED talking.  It's hard to fight the ED when it becomes your coping mechanism, your way of life... But you've been trying to fight it and I'm proud of you for doing so.  You deserve to eat.  Your body needs food as fuel.  Please try to eat even just a little bit.  And make sure you keep hydrated. â™¥
